bib_record.title: Measurement of nuclide production cross sections for proton-induced reactions on nat Ni and nat Zr at 0.4, 1.3, 2.2, and 3.0 GeV

free_txt: Main reference. See also TITLE and AUTHOR.
The 1157 keV activity due to 44gSc direct production
is separated from the activity originated from 44mSc
isomeric transition by using the Bateman equation.

By Hayato Takeshita (2022-08-04): The cooling time for
52gMn activity measurement is enough longer than the
half-life of 52mMn. Hence the measured 52Mn cross
section is considered as the ground state production
Al -> Al -> Ni -> Al -> Zr -> Al -> Ag -> Al ->

- Target-thickness: Thickness of 90 mg/cm2 for Ni, 80
